message.content:
cs.RO, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SY. 

This paper deals with the problem of active sensing in a mobile robot, which is a subfield of robotics (cs.RO). The solution proposed involves using machine vision cameras, which is a subfield of computer vision (cs.CV). The paper also uses a mutual information-based reward function, which is a common technique in machine learning and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The optimization of gaze direction is a problem that can be approached using techniques from reinforcement learning and decision making, which are also relevant to the subfield of machine learning (cs.LG). Finally, the paper deals with the implementation of the proposed solution on a real robot, which involves aspects of control and system integration, making it relevant to the subfield of systems and control (cs.SY).
